# Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
source('https://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R')
biocLite('seandavi/SRAdbV2')
```

# Setup

```{r}
library(SRAdbV2)
```

# Search

```{r}
sra_experiment_search()
sra_run_search()
sra_full_search()
sra_study_search(q='cancer')
```
